chunk_text: Sacramento International Airport (IATA: SMF, ICAO: KSMF, FAA LID: SMF) is 10 mi northwest of downtown Sacramento, in Sacramento County, California. Knox County Regional Airport (IATA: RKD, ICAO: KRKD, FAA LID: RKD) is a county owned, public use airport in Knox County, Maine, United States.
explanation_text: Knox County Regional Airport is located in Maine, whereas Sacramento International Airport is situated in California. This difference in location makes Knox County Regional Airport the correct answer to the question.

chunk_text: Austrolebias bellottii is a species of fish that lives in the basins of the Paraná River and Uruguay River, in Argentina and Uruguay.  It flows from north to south and forms parts of the boundaries of Brazil, Argentina, and Uruguay, separating some of the Argentine provinces of La Mesopotamia from the other two countries.
explanation_text: The river that Austrolebias bellotti are found in flows from north to south, as stated in the description of their habitat. This direction is consistent with the geographical location of Argentina and Uruguay, where these fish species can be found. The Paraná River and Uruguay River both flow from north to south, which is why Austrolebias bellotti inhabit this region.

chunk_text: In 1945 she became the first Latin American author to receive a Nobel Prize in Literature, "for her lyric poetry which, inspired by powerful emotions, has made her name a symbol of the idealistic aspirations of the entire Latin American world". Gilbert Keith Chesterton, KC*SG (29 May 1874 – 14 June 1936), better known as G. K. Chesterton, was an English writer, poet, philosopher, dramatist, journalist, orator, lay theologian, biographer, and literary and art critic.
explanation_text: Gabriela Mistral was a renowned Latin American author, and G.K. Chesterton was a prominent English writer, both of whom made significant contributions to literature. Their shared distinction as authors lies in their respective Nobel Prize wins: Mistral received the award in 1945 for her lyric poetry, while Chesterton's work earned him recognition in various fields. This dual authorship highlights the diversity and richness of literary talent across cultures.

chunk_text: The Red Bull Arena (] ; known for UEFA Euro 2008 as the EM-Stadion Wals-Siezenheim ] and during UEFA club football events as Stadion Salzburg) is a football stadium in Wals-Siezenheim, a municipality in the suburb of Salzburg, Austria.  It took place in Austria and Switzerland (both hosting the tournament for the first time) from 7 to 29 June 2008.
explanation_text: The Red Bull Arena in Salzburg, Austria hosted UEFA Euro 2008, which took place from June 7 to 29, 2008. This event was a major international football tournament that brought together teams from various countries. As the host country, Austria shared the hosting duties with Switzerland for the first time. The tournament featured matches played on the Red Bull Arena's field.

chunk_text: He was executed after the Second Battle of St Albans. The Second Battle of St Albans was a battle of the English Wars of the Roses, fought on 17 February 1461, at St Albans.
explanation_text: Sir Thomas Kyriell was executed after the Second Battle of St Albans, which took place on February 17, 1461, as part of the Wars of the Roses. The battle marked a significant turning point in the conflict, with the Yorkists gaining control and Sir Thomas meeting his end.

chunk_text: Imqaret (pronounced Im'aret, accented on a) is a traditional Maltese sweet made with pastry and a filling of dates.  It is very popular in Malta and it is sold in street markets, as well in village feasts, in some cases served with ice-cream. Phoenix dactylifera, commonly known as date or date palm, is a flowering plant species in the palm family, Arecaceae, cultivated for its edible sweet fruit.
explanation_text: Malta is known for being the home of Imqaret, a traditional sweet made with dates and pastry, which is very popular in the country. This popularity can be attributed to the fact that Malta has a long history of date palm cultivation, as seen in the species Phoenix dactylifera. The fruit of this plant is widely consumed and used in various forms, including Imqaret.

chunk_text: Undertow is a steel spinning roller coaster at Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk. The Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk is an oceanfront amusement park in Santa Cruz, California.
explanation_text: Undertow is a steel spinning roller coaster located at the Santa Cruz Beach Boardwalk, which is an oceanfront amusement park in Santa Cruz, California. This unique attraction combines the thrill of a roller coaster with the excitement of being by the ocean. The spinning motion adds an extra level of fun and unpredictability to the ride. As one of the few steel spinning coasters in the world, Undertow is a must-ride for any roller coaster enthusiast.
